pageProduct.name: Nutra-Life Ester C + Probiotics Chew 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This formula combines Ester-C® with Bacillus coagulans probiotic & Echinacea. Ester-C® is a research form of Vitamin C, which may lead to a more sustained retention of Vitamin C in the white blood cells than ascorbic acid*.
*in non-smokers
Nutra-Life® Ester-C® + Probiotics provides 24 hour immune support and decreases the duration and severity of common cold symptoms.

Size: 60 tablets

KEY FEATURES

• The 24 Hour Vitamin C
• Researched form of Vitamin C combined with the Bacillus coagulans probiotic

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced
diet. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Not suitable for children.
Bacillus coagulans may act the way some medicines work, including immunosuppressants. Consult your health professional before taking with other medicines.

Ingredients

Each tablet provides:
Ester-C® 327mg
[Calcium ascorbate dihydrate 319mg Equiv. Vitamin C (Ascorbic acid) 250mg, Calcium L-threonate 4mg, Calcium carbonate 3.66mg],
Sodium ascorbate 284mg Equiv. Vitamin C (Ascorbic acid) 250mg,
Total Vitamin C 500mg,
Bacillus coagulans (MTCC 5260) 500 million CFU,
Echinacea purpurea herb top flowering juice concentrate 11.12mg
Equiv. Echinacea purpurea herb top flowering juice fresh 500mg.

Contains: Contains: Sodium salts, soya bean products, sulfites, sugars.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Dairy| Egg| Gluten| Wheat

Directions

RECOMMENDED ADULT ONLY DOSAGE: Chew 2 tablets up to 3 times daily, or as directed
by your healthcare professional.

USAGE ADVICE

Recommended Adult Only Dosage: Chew 2 tablets up to 3 times daily, or as directed by your healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool dry place below 25°C. Keep out of reach of children.
